Html:
Maybe this is a difference of ideology, but it would be nice to have factory methods for at least some of the main classes(PHPExcel, PHPExcel_Worksheet, etc...) to allow for chaining methods.

i.e.

public static function factory(){
   
   $class = __CLASS__;

   return new $class;


}
Perhaps a good idea for class PHPExcel. Not so sure about other classes?
I think this is only useful for PHPExcel class, others support chaining already?
